page.title: 01Favourite Pastimes
page.content: Favourite pastimes Children May'85 {Scout/guide xxxxxxxxxxxxxx {Creative xxxxxxxxxx {Horse riding xxxxxx {Music xxxxxxxxx {Reading xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx {Walks xxxxxxxx {Bicycles xxxxxxxxxx {Television xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx {Computers xx {Mend things x {Boating xxxxxxx {Sport/club xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx {Swimming xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx {Music making xxxxxx {Fishing xxxxxxx {Nature x {Other games xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx { xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx From a sample of 50 aged 10yrs. Each {x }is 2 hour per week.
